titles.title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor during the Korean War.
To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor during the Korean War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor committed on November 18, 1952, during the Korean War as a lieutenant in the Navy.
